notification.text: Hey tell me about your products?

reply: Hey! So glad you asked! We're all about creating makeup that feels good and looks even better on *everyone*. Think inclusive shades, long-lasting formulas, and products that are easy to use whether you're a makeup pro or just starting out. We've got everything from our iconic Pro Filt'r foundation (seriously, a shade for everyone!) to Killawatt highlighters that give you that Rihanna glow. Plus, everything is cruelty-free! Check out our website for all the deets! âœ¨
